text: "Slow Rivers" is a duet by Elton John and Cliff Richard and taken from his 20th studio album Leather Jackets. It went to number 44 in the United Kingdom and was a bigger hit in Belgium where it to number 24 in Belgium and number 25 in Ireland. ==Track listings== UK 7" single #"Slow Rivers" – 3:08 #"Billy and the Kids" – 4:22 UK 12" single #"Slow Rivers" – 3:08 #"Billy and the Kids" – 4:22 #"Lord of the Flies" – 4:30 Category:1986 songs Category:Cliff Richard songs Category:Elton John songs
title: Slow Rivers
